description:
Casual comfort and classic style; in a way that only jeans can pull off.

  • Organic cotton and Sorona® polyester blend is rugged, yet soft, and has an easy stretch
  • Mid-rise and paneled construction hug your hips in all the right ways
  • Familiar 5-pocket layout
  • Button fly
  • Mesh lined pockets help you stay the right temperature
  • “Slim boyfriend fit”, so there’s still room to live, without looking like a relaxed fit
name: Prana Buxton Jeans - Women's
